name: The Backrealms
description:
v.0.2

Controls: ASWD And Arrow Keys. Click On Blitz To Reset Him. 

In this game, you play a character named Blitz. But he got sent to jail. Play as Blitz and fight cellmates as you progress through Blitz life!

Updates: fixed walking, mowed the lawn, played on my playscope 4,  now taking a nap...
